title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Game Design-Based Digital Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design game mechanics aligned with learning objectives with over 80% consistency.
Participants can develop game prototypes integrating educational elements in VR simulation environments.
Learners can create design proposals linking assessment mechanisms and learning activities according to construct alignment principles.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
